content: This file is accessible via a shared link from its parent folder, but you can create a custom external link with specific permissions.

comment.text: This text explains that a file or folder can be accessed through a parent folder's shared link, but users have the option to create a custom link with tailored permissions. It appears as explanatory text within a UI element, likely a dialog or panel, related to sharing files or folders. Translators should ensure the meaning of accessibility via a parent link and the possibility of custom links is preserved.
